sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } userRole: string = 'user'; isAdmin(): boolean { return this.userRole === 'admin'; } }
